item.description:
Agenda-

Group introductions. 30 seconds each on who we are, where we invest, goals going forward.

Review for a few minutes of what is happening in the real estate market. Input from any who wish to contribute as to what is happening with inventory, foreclosures, commercial pricing, rental market, sales, price trends in your local area of interest. Do some homework so you can bring value to the rest of the group.

Buy-Sell opportunities from anyone in the group.

Brainstorm session on topics and interests, speakers - either specific or areas of interest - that you are interested in hearing from in meetings. Vote on refreshments, amenities. And the logistics.

Brainstorm on use of the meetup forum for questions, opportunities, discussions.

The meeting begins at 7, and is supposed to end at 9 or so. Bring your business cards.

Let's decide together what we want this meetup to be. Dale organized it, got the time and place, built a membership of RE investment-minded folks, and we now have the platform to grow our meetup to its next level and add value for each of us.

RSVP and plan on coming!
item.how_to_find_us: The room is through the lobby and down the hall to the theatre room. They will give you directions in the front lobby at the reception desk!
item.why: This is your RE investment group. This is your time to create a mastermind group and resource for your RE investing and wealth building.
item.name: Planning what you want!
